post.body: I've been reasonalby happy with dreamhost.
I wish I was there in the VIP seats. One year, I was in the front row for the KN at WWDC.
get your ride in today. Looks like nothing but rain tomorrow.
back when I did Radio MacGuys, I got VIP seats. Media is closer?
did you get a VIP keynote pass this year?
Interesting concept but cash incentives would work better for most teachers I know.
MacMgrs is one of my fave parties at MWE. Wish I was there.
Steve Jobs may not be Mike's dad, but he is his favorite uncle.
In my institute, such people are called "graduate students".
lol....a "all caps" hacker is disrupting the MacRumorsLife feed.
Yipes...somebody just hacked the macosrumorslive feed.
Favorite liveblog so far is GeekBrief.TV, but the photos on engadget are fun.
Faces sounds cool...I can already see ways to add it to my workflow.
Decisions, decisions..which liveblogger should I follow during the keynote?
Tallahassee: Students at Florida A&M University (FAMU) in the School of Nursing received a 100 percent pass rate on the National Boards.
Let's see....Florida legislators cut taxes to the rich folk and now are cutting services to the poor folk. Hmmm.
Please - somebody come up with a magpie spam blocker for twitter.
